1_17nEvSvj4DevhTAkNozSqveC6qxjFc6PR5.body:
Hi! The most simple way is to have multiple copies of ZeroNet, each with its own 'users.json', where the private key of your user certificate is stored.

You can also try to set up the Multiuser plugin. I've never tryed that, so I can give no advice on that.
